chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x <-> (forall eps : posreal, locally x (fun u : R_UniformSpace => Rabs (f u - f x) < eps))

Premises:
R_UniformSpace = UniformSpace.Pack R R_UniformSpace_mixin R : UniformSpace
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
continuity_pt = fun (f : R -> R) (x0 : R) => continue_in f no_cond x0 : (R -> R) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
continuity_P1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), continuity_pt f x < -> (forall W : R -> Prop, neighbourhood W (f x) -> exists V : R -> Prop, neighbourhood V x /\ (forall y : R, V y -> W (f y)))
filterlim_locally_cauchy : forall f : R -> ?U, (forall eps : posreal, exists P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?x P /\ (forall u v : R, P u -> P v -> ball (f u) eps (f v))) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlim f (Rbar_locally ?x) (locally y)) where ?U : [ |- CompleteSpace] ?x : [ |- Rbar]
continuous_neq_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> f x0 <> 0 -> exists eps : posreal, forall h : R, Rabs h < eps -> f (x0 + h) <> 0
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
filterlimi_locally_cauchy : forall f : R -> ?U -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?x (fun x : R => (exists y : ?U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : ?U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> (forall eps : posreal, exists P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?x P /\ (forall u v : R, P u -> P v -> forall u' v' : ?U, f u u' -> f v v' -> ball u' eps v')) < -> (exists y : ?U, filterlimi f (Rbar_locally ?x) (locally y)) where ?U : [ |- CompleteSpace] ?x : [ |- Rbar]
Heine : forall (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop), compact X -> (forall x : R, X x -> continuity_pt f x) -> uniform_continuity f X
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
CVU_continuity : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) (r : posreal), CVU fn f x r -> (forall (n : nat) (y : R), Boule x r y -> continuity_pt (fn n) y) -> forall y : R, Boule x r y -> continuity_pt f y
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
filterlim_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball y eps (f x))) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- UniformSpace] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlimi_locally : forall (f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop) (y : ?U), filterlimi f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => exists z : ?U, f x z /\ ball y eps z)) where ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- UniformSpace] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
filterlim_locally_ball_norm : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (y : ?U), filterlim f ?F (locally y) < -> (forall eps : posreal, ?F (fun x : ?T => ball_norm y eps (f x))) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?T : [ |- Type] ?U : [ |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [ |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [ |- Filter ?F]
CVU = fun (fn : nat -> R -> R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) (r : posreal) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists N : nat, forall (n : nat) (y : R), (N <= n)%nat -> Boule x r y -> Rabs (f y - fn n y) < eps : (nat -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> posreal -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope _]
continuity_pt_finite_SF : forall (fn : nat -> R -> R) (N : nat) (x : R), (forall n : nat, (n <= N)%nat -> continuity_pt (fn n) x) -> continuity_pt (fun y : R => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => fn k y) N) x
at_left = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => u < x) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally_not : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), ~ (forall eps : posreal, ~ (forall y : ?T, ball x eps y -> ~ P y)) -> locally x (fun y : ?T => ~ P y) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
filtermapi_proper_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun x : T => (exists y : U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter (filtermapi f F)
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d ->...-> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
at_right = fun x : R => within (fun u : R => x < u) (locally x) : R -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope function_scope]
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 ->...-> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
